repos_data.description: MCP server for semantic code research and context generation on real-time using LLM patterns | Search naturally across public & private repos based on your permissions | Transform any accessible codebase/s into AI-optimized knowledge on simple and complex flows | Find real implementations and live docs from anywhere
AI Coders search blindly. Be their guide.
MCP server providing semantic Java code analysis for AI agents. Built on Eclipse JDT with tools for navigation, refactoring, search, and metrics.
